page.title: 16Domesday Project. A poem
page.content: The Domesday Project,what a lot to do Getting a lot of information, Doing some calculation, And finding a friend that is new.{ {Working with a friend in a different {school, {Trying different things that you have {not done before. {Getting to know the final score, {Hoping that nobody thinks you're a {fool!} In the street with your pen and pencil Asking people many a thing. About how much money your job may bring, Completing charts with a stencil.{ {When the work is over and done, {Did you enjoy it? Are you sure? {I did! I don't think it's a bore! {It was really such great fun.} Joanne Mason,aged 11.
